results.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
results.short_title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
results.latest_major_action: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) Agriculture; (2) Appropriations; (3) Armed Services; (4) the Budget; (5) Education and the Workforce; (6) Energy and Commerce; (7) Financial Services; (8) Foreign Affairs; (9) Homeland Security; (10) House Administration; (11) the Judiciary; (12) Natural Resources; (13) Oversight and Government Reform; (14) Science, Space, and Technology; (15) Small Business; (16) Transportation and Infrastructure; (17) Veterans' Affairs; and (18) Ways and Means.

actions.description: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection. (text: CR H372)
Considered by unanimous consent. (consideration: CR H372-373)
Mr. Crowley asked unanimous consent to consider as introduced.
